title: #246 - Ms. Pat & ME
description:
Comedian & Author Ms. Pat sits with me and her oldest daughter to talk about dealing drugs with her daughter in pampers, her new book "RABBIT: The Autobiography of Ms. Pat" coming out August 22nd, having to help her "retarded" uncle have sex with prostitutes, and how scary it is having a son who is black in America.

Please pre order Ms. Pat's book BEFORE AUG 22nd -   "RABBIT: The Autobiography of Ms. Pat" here: https://www.amazon.com/Rabbit-Autobiography-Ms-Patricia-Williams/dp/0062407309

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This Podcast is brought to you by ZipRecruiter and right now, my listeners can post jobs on ZipRecruiter for free by going to https://www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast
